overview: Marisa Linardos is responsible for managing Basho Technologies’ Finance, Human Resource, and Office Management functions. Marisa has 15 years of Finance and Accounting experience at start-ups and international consultancies specializing in financial planning and analysis, cash management, and financial reporting. Prior to Basho, Marisa was Corporate Finance Manager at Monitor Company Group where she was responsible for Monitor’s worldwide financial reporting, budgeting, analysis, and modeling for the consulting partnership. Prior to Monitor, Marisa provided financial consulting services to TIAX LLC, and held several corporate and operational Finance positions at Arthur D. Little. Marisa holds a BS in Accounting and an MBA from Bentley College.
